movie.title: Ocean Waves
movie.description_intro: The main character travels to his hometown for his high school reunion. During the trip, he recalls the memories of the days in high school. Friendship, subtle love, a trip to Tokyo and so on all came back to him as the film evolves.
movie.description_full: The main character travels to his hometown for his high school reunion. During the trip, he recalls the memories of the days in high school. Friendship, subtle love, a trip to Tokyo and so on all came back to him as the film evolves.

movies.title: Wonder Woman: Bloodlines
movies.summary: Witness the legendary origin of renowned Justice League member Wonder Woman as she fights for good with her sword and magic lasso. Equally strong in body, heart and will, she makes it her mission to help a troubled young girl enlisted by a deadly organization known as Villainy, Inc., whose criminal members have their sights set on invading Themyscira, Wonder Woman's paradise home. The battle will be epic, because if there's one thing an Amazon knows, it's war.
movies.description_full: Witness the legendary origin of renowned Justice League member Wonder Woman as she fights for good with her sword and magic lasso. movies.title: The Misty Green Sky
movies.summary: A young girl in another solar system asks an innocent question that sets off a chain reaction of adventure, destruction and tragedy.
movies.description_full: A young girl in another solar system asks an innocent question that sets off a chain reaction of adventure, destruction and tragedy.
movies.synopsis: A young girl in another solar system asks an innocent question that sets off a chain reaction of adventure, destruction and tragedy.

movies.title: Fist of the North Star
movies.summary: After a nuclear holocaust tears the world apart, mankind is forced to the harshness of not only the oppression of others who are much more powerful, but the dead earth which seems to be getting worse with every passing moment. But a savior has risen from the ashes, a man who will defeat those who would torment the weak and make the world a livable place once more. A man named Kenshiro.....

movies.title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
movies.title_english: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
movies.title_long: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole (2010)
movies.summary: Soren (Jim Sturgess), a young barn owl, is kidnapped by owls of St. Aggie's, ostensibly an orphanage, where owlets are brainwashed into becoming soldiers. He and his new friends escape to the island of Ga'Hoole, to assist its noble, wise owls who fight the army being created by the wicked rulers of St. Aggie's.
movies.description_full: Soren (Jim Sturgess), a young barn owl, is kidnapped by owls of St. Aggie's, ostensibly an orphanage, where owlets are brainwashed into becoming soldiers. He and his new friends escape to the island of Ga'Hoole, to assist its noble, wise owls who fight the army being created by the wicked rulers of St. Aggie's.
